structure.unit: JUVENILE PROCEEDINGS -- COMMITMENT AND CARE OF CHILDREN

law.history: Repealed 1956 Ky. Acts ch. 157, sec. 54, effective February 27, 1956. -- Amended 1954 Ky. Acts ch. 185, sec. 2, effective June 17, 1954. -- Created 1952 Ky. Acts ch. 161, sec. 58, effective July 1, 1952.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Powers and duties of governing board.
